DOC.detailed_description: This study consist two visit , two five day apart . The first visit : - Healthy volunteer empty stomach . - clinical examination , blood test blood sample take constitute blood collection . IRAP concentration measure sample . The second visit : This visit take place interval 2 5 day first visit . - Subjects empty stomach - An oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) 3 hour perform . Blood sample take three time 15 minute apart Baseline ( take glucose ) . And glucose intake , blood sample take every 15 minute measure insulinemia , blood glucose , IRAP concentration .
